summary: This document is an email chain from July 1, 2020, discussing a draft press advisory for a press conference related to Ghislaine Maxwell. The participants are reviewing and editing the document, with a focus on highlighting COVID-19 safety protocols.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email chain is about drafting an advisory for her upcoming press conference.

events.title: Drafting of Ghislaine Maxwell Press Conference Advisory
events.description: Email correspondence among individuals editing a draft press advisory for a Ghislaine Maxwell press conference, with specific attention to COVID-19 safety protocols.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated July 1, 2020, concerning a draft press advisory for a Ghislaine Maxwell press conference.
The primary editorial focus was on making COVID-19 safety and distancing protocols more prominent in the advisory.
The email participants' names and email addresses are redacted in the provided text.
